name: H.E.R.M.E.S
description:
Welcome to our game Hermes!

Our game Hermes gives you command of a packaging station located in outer space. Your job is to supply the nearby struggling planets with the dearly needed resources while also avoiding to go bankrupt.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was part of our final project in our second year of our study CMGT.

We worked hard to create a game to promote efficient packaging, albeit in an extraterrestrial setting. You can try it out, give us feedback, whatever works. We would love to know how we could've improved, and we'll use it in future projects.
